channel.title: Max stat
channel.description: I am a coder for a 317 server. The max stat is 200 and we are trying to change it to 99. We have looked into al of the files and i was told to look into a file name formulae.java. i don't have a file named formulae.java. Is there any other file that might have the lines in which i can change the max stat?

item.title: Max stat
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

[quote="_™, post:2, topic:290792"]Formulae is not how you spell ‘formula’ and it is most likely the return value, and the stopping of int i, in the method getLevelForXP.

the hunt beat me to formula…[/quote]

Formulae is the plural of formula. Also acceptable are formulæ and formulas.

Read full topic
